data: Saving energy means less greenhouse gases will get into the air.

topic: NIEHS's 'Worm Wigwams' Welcome Wiggly Waste Watchers
data: Composting bins use worm to turn organic waste into usable mulch.
Your recycling mission is not impossible! In fact, it is very simple: Don't throw away anything that can be recycled!
A key part of waste 'reduction' is 'conservation'â€”using natural resources wisely,and using less than usual in order avoid waste.
You can 'reuse' materials in their original form instead of throwing them away, or pass those materials on to others who could use them too!
